description:
RequestLogging is using as start time when the context object was created.  

There is a lot of logic between RequestLogging and when the context object is created, which leads to much shorter times reported in the log then expected.
title: time reported by ec2 log is incorrect

comments.content:
RequestLogging is using as start time when the context object was created.  

There is a lot of logic between RequestLogging and when the context object is created, which leads to much shorter times reported in the log then expected.
